main.name: Ariel Leon Flores
main.description: Thank you for taking a look at my Portfolio!
main.bio: I'm Ariel, a Lighthouse Labs graduate currently working as a Web Development mentor for Lighthouse Labs Web Development Bootcamp. I have extensive Experience in Sales, Hospitality and Customer service. As an Afro-Latino, I have taken part in multiple events to discuss intersectionality and belonging within the work place as well as help coordinate networking opportunities for my communities. I enjoy learning new skills and hope that this new career will allow me to increase my knowledge and grow more each day. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions
main.contactmessage: If you would like to get in contact with me, please feel free to use the form below.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the skills I picked up during my time with Lighthouse Labs:

education.description: Scholarship recipient for intensive Web-Development Bootcamp where I learned Javascript, NodeJS, HTML, CSS, ReactJS, Ruby on Rails as well as Databases and Data Modeling

work.title: Web Development Mentor
work.description: As a mentor, I assist and guide students of Lighthouse Labs Web Development Bootcamp with their code and help in increasing understanding of concepts taught during the day's lecture. My daily tasks consist of helping the students understand how to think like developers, how to debug their own code and how to properly divide tasks in small concise steps to write readable, modular code. This role allows me to reinforce the many skills I learned during bootcamp while reviewing and refactoring previous coding challenges all while further developing my soft skills.

projects.title: Fresh BsQt
projects.category: Grocery Delivery App aiming to offer delivery options for small neighborhood stores within a specified range of users' current location in order to promote buying fresh & Local.

projects.title: Jungle
projects.category: A mini e-commerce application built with Rails 4.2. It is a responsive MPA using a Rails backend with Active Record.

projects.title: Scheduler
projects.category: A Interview appointment creation tool built as a Single Page App with React

projects.title: Tweeter
projects.category: A single page Twitter clone using JavaScript, AJAX, Express and MongoDB
